title: 106. Choosing Yourself and Your Desires above ALL
description:
Happy Thursday!

In this episode, we talk about choosing OURSELVES, our needs, and our desires above EVERYTHING. This episode was inspired by Naomi Osaka choosing her well-being over her career. Listen in as we chat  Naomi Osaka, feminine energy, and radical self-love.

Make sure to RSVP for A Date with Desire, a live, 60 minute group zoom call event- hosted by me- in celebration of the return of my group coaching program, the Embodied Womxn where we go DEEP in all things energy & manifestation. This is a night where you MEET you & your desires and leave the limiting beliefs that aren't serving you behind. Click here to see allll the details.

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
